item.title: Django 文件上传
item.description: Django 文件上传 添加上传路径 ----settings.py----- UPLOAD_ROOT = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, 'upload').replace('\\', '/') UPLOAD_URL = '/upload/' 将文件夹注册到路由 ----urls.py---- from django.conf import settings from django.conf.urls.static import static urlpatterns=[...] urlpatterns += static(settings.UPLOAD_URL, document_root=settings.UPLOAD_ROOT)
